title: Characterizing Cyberattacks against Operational Technology Infrastructures through the Lens of Attack Flows
description: A paper characterizing four OT cyberattacks, published in Military Cyber Affairs.

title: Visual AI Players for the Game of Go
description: A paper providing an overview of a semester project focused on playing the game of Go using a visual AI agent.

title: Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning
description: A paper providing an review of what I learned in a study of Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning.
